response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, it's worth $12,000 to us. However, to make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product for an exclusive price of $10,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10000}
